troubleshooting.title: Windows Service Reports Process Terminated Unexpectedly Error (TCP Server)

keywords.indexterm: Installing OxygenTCP floating license serverWindows 32-bitProcess Terminated Unexpectedly error

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: My TCP floating license server reports a "Process Terminated Unexpectedly" error message for the Windows service.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: This error message appears if the Windows service launcher quits immediately after being started. This problem usually happens because the license key has not been correctly deployed (license.txt file in the license folder).

steps-informal.p: Re-deploy your license key. For more information, see the Setting up a Floating License Server section.
